battery-life_ipod_nano_8gb: i bought the nano as a replacement for an older classic, which was a great unit but time has taken it's toll on the battery and screen .
battery life isn't great, but other than that, would highly recommend .
i think apple's idea is that instead of replacing the battery, you will exchange it for a newer ipod .
gas_mileage_toyota_camry_2007: doesn't anyone build a quiet car out there for around 30k that used regular gas and gets good gas mileage ?
mileage out of the showroom was way below advertised , but seems to have come around over time .

hesitating then surge between shifts, windshield wipers that move with power that rocks the car to the point that it feels like it will roll over, plastic parts falling off, cruise control is so unreliable i don't use it, bad mileage, and, last but not least, half the windshild blacks out when driving at night through areas without street lights .
room_holiday_inn_london: be cautious of using the room services like the phone, mini bar and room service as the prices are sky high, but i would definitely stay there again and i would recommend this hotel to anyone !
the bathroom was small, and water pressure was weak, but it was doable .
i politely explained about my shock at being given a completely different room than what was booked !
location_holiday_inn_london: great room fabulous price wonderful location !
like other reviews, the location of the hotel is great, seconds around the corner from the tube .
the holiday inn kensington forum has a fantastic location for a city break in london .
staff_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: all the staff we encountered were super friendly and the hotel location is great .
voice_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the voice is very clear and gives plenty of warning when we need to make a turn ahead .
the default voice is extremely clear and easy to understand, so i never even tried any of the alternative voices .
many a times, this is a distraction as you will be wondering what the voice command said .
speed_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: speed of calculation, accuracy, and simplicity of operation are top notch .
when you are looking at the map, you are shown the speed limit for the road you are travelling on, and your actual speed .
indicates posted speed limits of the road you are on
size_asus_netbook_1005ha: , i was willing to downsize my screen size in favor of portability and speed .
speaking of which, the keyboard's relatively large size , at 92% of the size of a normal one , writing longer texts on it is no problem .
the keyboard isn't quite full sized of course, but very easy to get used to .
screen_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the garmin nuvi 255w i bought through amazon has a dead red pixel which is always on and what is worse is that the position of that red dot is right in the middle of the screen .
i've only used the wide screen versions, so i can't compare, but i personally wouldn't want to go to a smaller screen .
if you missed the spoken directions, you can look at the top of the screen for written directions .
battery-life_amazon_kindle: by the way, kindle battery lasts forever indeed !
a week ago, i ordered my kindle 2 and when it was delivered, the battery was in critical stage and it would not power on .
battery life is very good, even with the wireless on constantly .
satellite_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: it grabs satellites quickly and recalculates routes in seconds after i veer off in the wrong direction .

by the time the main menu comes up after turning the device on it generally already has a full 100% signal from the satellites and it's ready to navigate, a beautiful crystal clear lcd widescreen, and tons of other features .
the time that it takes to acqure the satellites is about 10, 30 seconds .
battery-life_netbook_1005ha: when i learned about the battery life, the memory, hard drive, processor, etc .
pro's , i so wanted to love the small size, long battery life, brilliant blue color and light weight .
battery life depends on how it's being used but it's much better than it's little brother the eee pc 900 .
keyboard_netbook_1005ha: a lot of netbooks on the market have mangled the keyboard in one way or another such that if you are a touch typist, you find yourself hitting the wrong key often, which is frustrating .
the keyboard is easy to type on , the battery life is great, and i've found that i really do like the touch pad with all its features .
the keyboard is generous for a netbook, but i still have some trouble typing on it .
service_swissotel_hotel_chicago: great service in there, and a nice quiet place to grab a drink and just talk .
front desk staff need customer service 101 .
video_ipod_nano_8gb: comes in different colors, make videos, and holds alot of music .
the video camera and the graphics is so cool !
performance_netbook_1005ha: very acceptable performance for what netbooks are designed to do .
the performance is great for it's size , remember these are not designed to be speed demons but to be highly portable and cordless for extended periods of time .
it enhances performance, but is not absolutely necessary because this unit is a full featured machine .
service_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the service is always great and the rooms very clean .
we found a great breakfast place just around the corner in taylor st, called darren's cafe, good prices with excellant food and service .
food_holiday_inn_london: the food was delicious in both the consortia and forum restaurants in the hotel .
the food is excellent and the service great .
there was an adequate self service buffet, not a huge selection or very well presented, cloths were not changed when food got spilt .
comfort_honda_accord_2008: when i bought this car a year ago, i initially wrote a review stating i may have buyer's remorse due to extremely uncomfortable driver's seat .
everyone loves the way it rides and we took it to the lake without a single complaint of comfort .
updates_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: in a test the day i received the unit, before map updates, i was directed to exit the freeway many miles before it made sense .

i have held off from getting any gps unit for a long time because i have a book of maps for the united states and i have always been able to update the travel atlas and supplement that with free maps from the internet via google, yahoo, etc .
i found the maps to be inaccurate at first, but after i updated them from garmin's website everything is golden .
staff_swissotel_chicago: the staff was courteous, professional and efficient the room very pleasant, and the location great !
my one issue was with the staff .
features_windows7: there is not a lot of new features in the operating system .
it does have some nice features .

personally i thought vista was very handsome, what with its transparency, 3, d effects, color schemes, and usability improvements to windows explorer, and i believe windows 7 continues that trend by looking just as sexy , , if not more , , while at the same time adding its own valuable features and enhancements .
interior_toyota_camry_2007: the interior rattles, with pieces falling off, the ride is not that great, and the handling of the vehicle is absolutely the worst i have ever experienced .
interior exterior quality is very good .
the interior is very luxurious and comfortable, however the car feels slower than my 2002 camry le .
transmission_toyota_camry_2007: transmission big issue and also rattles more than the 2001 avalon that had 175k miles
my transmission works perfectly fine, is fun to shift but does better on its own .
i hate the transmission as it always hesitates to downshift when the power and speed is needed .
sound_ipod_nano_8gb: good sound and useful as a radio but that
earphones sound good, but slides out of ears .
bigger picture, doesn't need a headset to hear it, but sound is fabulous through headset .
screen_ipod_nano_8gb: this is a vast improvement on the last nano, with a bigger screen and more capacity .
the screen is easy to read and the built in speaker works well .
i found a lovely cheapo case with screen protection on amazon, and i think the gift worked out great .
buttons_amazon_kindle: i hit the button, bent over to plug in the kindle, and the phone rang before i straightened up .
when i'm trying to go to the next page, i hit the home button by accident a lot .
what i hate , i hate the new button positioning .
service_holiday_inn_london: be cautious of using the room services like the phone, mini bar and room service as the prices are sky high, but i would definitely stay there again and i would recommend this hotel to anyone !
if you hang around in the lobby, you can hear other people complaining about poor service, poor room quality and a host of other problems to the staff .
price_holiday_inn_london: great room fabulous price wonderful location !
overall, for the price , it is a pretty good deal .
although the menu is limited it was very good and a reasonable price .
seats_honda_accord_2008: i love the seats, they are supportive .
ride is very good, but seats are just a little firm .
i test drove an ex, l and felt the seats were too firm plus, the ex, l seemed too slow .
rooms_swissotel_chicago: the rooms are business, oriented, so they are not as hip or stylish as, say, the sutton place or the w .
great location nice rooms loved the swissotel !
great location but rooms need some work .
bathroom_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the hotel was of a good standard, big clean rooms, decent bathroom and the free wine reception in the evening was an added bonus .
the bathrooms are quite small compared to other hotels but adequate .
otherwise the bathroom was decent enough , decent temperature and decent water pressure .
food_swissotel_chicago: the food at the swissotel is better than the average hotel but nothing special .
we also did the chicago food tasting tour which you can find here on travelzoo, this was fantastic and well worth the $40 pp .
we enjoyed the breakfast although the other evening food service was a bit skimpy .
accuracy_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: speed of calculation, accuracy, and simplicity of operation are top notch .
only is only accurate when an ad says, top sirloin steak, only $1 .
a lot of my friends' addresses are inaccurate by any gps .
directions_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the model 255w that we received seemed to take longer to find a satelite, and the man's voice was very fast and not as clear, and at times seemed a bit confused in directions .
depending on what you are using it for, it is a nice adjunct to a travel trip and the directions are accurate and usually the quickest, but not always .
gives you immediate directions to get to the location you chose to set up as your home location .
mileage_honda_accord_2008: little 4cyl 5 spd lx and it got awesome gas mileage .
gas mileage is horrible too, 20 mpg city highway after 6000 miles .
strangely, the gas mileage is not as good as the acura but is acceptable .
eyesight-issues_amazon_kindle: the e ink is so comfortable on the eyes .
i enjoy having the text at the largest size because there is less eyestrain .
, the screen is easy on the eyes .
screen_netbook_1005ha: , i was willing to downsize my screen size in favor of portability and speed .
the screen is stunning, and if you've got a bright light shining down on it, you've got a choice :
the screen is clear and easily viewed in indoor environments .
navigation_amazon_kindle: i was worried about navigation without the scroll wheel, but find it much easier to use and it is more productive and faster to use the new navigation .
amazon claim's it's only 20% faster, but it feels almost twice as fast , and the menus are much better organized and easier to navigate .
this is a beautiful little product it feels sleek and sturdy and booklike in my hands, the controls are finally where they ought to be and the navigation interface is intuitive and easy to learn .
location_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: decent suite ok price great location
collect the same rate as for fisherman's wharf location .
the location is great, the hotel is very clean and nicely decorated .
speed_windows7: i started to upload a youtube video, went away to have breakfast and came back to a blue screen of death .
i do note this computer is running much faster but part of that may well be that it now has 4 gb of memory as opposed to 3gb
it is more stable than vista and wakes up from sleep much faster, also boots faster .
price_amazon_kindle: non, best seller book prices should be lower, just like some magazine subscriptions are .

however, i will say, the selection of inexpensive books has been worth the purchase price of this item especially for those that enjoy reading the classics or nationwide news, it has been a joy to purchase entire collections for a fraction of the cost of purchasing new or even used books .
and i know for sure that many print publishers will see this as an opportunity to provide attractively priced paper books as an alternative .
quality_toyota_camry_2007: i had always heard that toyota had the best quality cars .
i love the car's visual and aesthetic design, but quality is just as important and for that reason, i would not recommend the new camry to anyone !
it has high quality amazing ride and the fit and finish is great .
comfort_toyota_camry_2007: however, when we drove the camry we were impressed with its looks and the comfort of the ride .
you can't have it both ways, either a car is full of power and stiff suspension or it's smooth and comfortable on the road .
fonts_amazon_kindle: font sizes and page orientation can be adapted to the reader's needs .
it's just like reading a paper book, but better because you can increase the font size !

due to being able to change the font it is also difficult to be able to read this for a class and reference page numbers from an actual book, but a search function that regular books , don't', have more than makes up for this .
interior_honda_accord_2008: however i have few complaints about the interior .
from the hard and uncomfortable driver seat, excessive body roll, several rattles in the interior and intrusive road noise, the vehicle just does not strike a chord n .
the interior and exterior are nice .
rooms_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the rooms are very clean and very well appointed .
the beds very comfortable, rooms tastefully decorated and were very clean and comfortable .
the rooms that number 401, 402, 403, 405, 406, 408, 409, 412, 414, and 415 face out to the main street .
performance_honda_accord_2008: the previous models were boring both aestically and performance wise .
features, quality, reliability, and performance, at a price no other car maker can touch .
i went for comfort over performance to fit it in my budget so the ex, l with the 4 cyl engine .
display_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the sound went out on it and only the display worked .
my old unit counts this down for you and provides an estimate of eta on the map display .
the instructions sometimes are a little difficult to understand, but written at the top of the display is the next turn information .
free_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: it's location is fantastic if you want to get to the ballpark, to the cable car, on and off the freeway, to the wharf, etc .
the reception area is compact and during the free evening wine sampling gets quite busy .
free coffee and biscotti in the morning helped get the gf out of bed .
parking_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: hotel parking is now $23 a night .
the hotel, located a few blocks from fisherman's wharf as well as ghiardelli square, has a nice italian theme that carries into the lobby as well as the uniforms for the parking valets .
parking at $45 a night was outrageous, but probably worth it to keep your car safe .
